casebody.data:
CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS AND ADMINISTRATIVE ACTIONS

May 12, 2006

[Cite as 05/12/2006 Case Announcements, 2006-Ohio-2324.]

MOTION AND PROCEDURAL RULINGS

2004- 0892. Fostoria v. Ohio Patrolmen’s Benevolent Assn.

Seneca App. No. 13-03-26, 2004-Ohio-1945. This cause came on for further consideration of appellants’ motion for leave to file a reply to appellee’s response to the show cause order. Upon consideration thereof,

IT IS ORDERED by the court that the motion is granted, and appellants shall file their reply within ten days of the date of this entry.
